BatchCreateAcl.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ckafka.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: BatchCreateAcl
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "ckafka-xx",
    "ResourceType": 2,
    "RuleList": [
        {
            "Operation": "Read",
            "PermissionType": "Allow",
            "Host": "10.1.1.0/24",
            "Principal": "User:*"
        }
    ],
    "ResourceNames": [
        "rewr",
        "topic-1"
    ]
}
BatchCreateAcl.title: Batch Creating ACLs

BatchModifyGroupOffsets.document: This example shows you how to bulk set the consumer group offset for Groups.
BatchModifyGroupOffsets.title: Bulk Setting the Consumer Group offset for Groups

BatchModifyTopicAttributes.document: This example shows you how to batch set topic properties.
BatchModifyTopicAttributes.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ckafka.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: BatchModifyTopicAttributes
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "ckafka-o99zq5mv",
    "Topic": [
        {
            "TopicName": "test_leader",
            "RetentionMs": 3600000,
            "SegmentMs": 86400000,
            "MaxMessageBytes": 1024,
            "RetentionBytes": 1099511627776,
            "LogMsgTimestampType": null
        }
    ]
}
BatchModifyTopicAttributes.title: Batch Set Topic Properties

CreateAclRule.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ckafka.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAclRule
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "ckafka-12345678",
    "ResourceType": "Topic",
    "RuleList": [
        {
            "Host": "1.2.3.4",
            "Principal": "User:*",
            "Operation": "Write",
            "PermissionType": "Allow"
        }
    ],
    "RuleName": "testRule",
    "PatternType": "PREFIXED",
    "Pattern": "testPattern"
}
CreateAclRule.title: Adding ACL Rules Example

CreateConsumer.document: This example shows you how to create a consumer.
CreateConsumer.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ckafka.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateConsumer
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "ckafka-test",
    "TopicName": "topic-test",
    "GroupName": "group-test"
}
CreateConsumer.title: Creating a Consumer

CreateInstancePre.document: This example shows you how to create a professional edition prepaid instance with a disk capacity of 200GB and a peak bandwidth of 20MB/s.
CreateInstancePre.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ckafka.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateInstancePre
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceName": "test55",
    "VpcId": "vpc-rmcgxxxx",
    "SubnetId": "subnet-mnzcxxxx",
    "ZoneId": 450001,
    "Period": "1m",
    "RenewFlag": 0,
    "InstanceType": 1,
    "KafkaVersion": "2.4.1",
    "SpecificationsType": "profession",
    "DiskSize": 200,
    "BandWidth": 20,
    "Partition": 400,
    "DiskType": "CLOUD_BASIC",
    "PublicNetworkMonthly": 0
}
CreateInstancePre.title: Creating a Prepaid Instance

CreateInstancePre.document: This example shows you how to create a prepaid standard edition instance with an entry-level specification for one month.
CreateInstancePre.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ckafka.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateInstancePre
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceName": "test57",
    "VpcId": "vpc-rmcgxxxx",
    "SubnetId": "subnet-mnzcxxxx",
    "ZoneId": 450001,
    "Period": "1m",
    "RenewFlag": 2,
    "InstanceType": 1,
    "KafkaVersion": "2.4.1",
    "SpecificationsType": "standard",
    "DiskSize": 200,
    "BandWidth": 20,
    "Partition": 400
}
CreateInstancePre.title: Creating a Prepaid Standard Edition Instance

CreatePostPaidInstance.document: This example shows you how to create a post-payment for professional edition instance with a disk size of 200GB and peak bandwidth of 20MB/s.

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ckafka.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreatePostPaidInstance
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceName": "test55",
    "VpcId": "vpc-rmcgxxxx",
    "SubnetId": "subnet-mnzcxxxx",
    "ZoneId": 450001,
    "InstanceType": 1,
    "KafkaVersion": "2.4.2",
    "SpecificationsType": "profession",
    "DiskSize": 200,
    "BandWidth": 20,
    "Partition": 400,
    "DiskType": "CLOUD_BASIC",
    "PublicNetworkMonthly": 0
}
CreatePostPaidInstance.title: Creating a Postpaid Pro Edition Instance

CreatePostPaidInstance.document: This example shows you how to create three postpaid Pro Edition instances simultaneously.
CreatePostPaidInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ckafka.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreatePostPaidInstance
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceName": "test58",
    "VpcId": "vpc-rmcg5cpf",
    "SubnetId": "subnet-mnzcs7gk",
    "KafkaVersion": "2.4.2",
    "SpecificationsType": "profession",
    "BandWidth": 20,
    "DiskSize": 200,
    "Partition": 400,
    "TopicNum": 200,
    "ZoneId": 450001,
    "InstanceNum": 3,
    "PublicNetworkMonthly": 12
}
CreatePostPaidInstance.title: Creating Pay-As-You-Go Pro Edition Instances in Batches

CreatePostPaidInstance.document: This example shows you how to create a triple-az Pro Edition instance.

Host: ckafka.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreatePostPaidInstance
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceName": "test55",
    "VpcId": "vpc-rmcgxxxx",
    "SubnetId": "subnet-mnzcxxxx",
    "ZoneId": 450001,
    "InstanceType": 1,
    "KafkaVersion": "2.4.2",
    "SpecificationsType": "profession",
    "DiskSize": 200,
    "BandWidth": 20,
    "Partition": 400,
    "DiskType": "CLOUD_BASIC",

        450001,
        450002,
        450003
    ]
}
CreatePostPaidInstance.title: Creating a Postpaid Multi-AZ Pro Edition Instance
